long_description: . Author: Todd Martin. Softcover; 500 pages; color photographs. Todd's Hiking Guide, LLC; copyright 2011. . Author provides essential equipment, natural history facts and low-impact canyoneering techniques. Includes locations of water sources. Guide measures 9 in. x 6 in.
short_description: Grand Canyoneering helps you explore the rugged gorges, secret slots and off-the-beaten-path gems of Grand Canyon National Park.
